creator: mitch3883@cox.net
text:
I have installed Apache about 10 tens and still continue to get this message 
when I try to start APache.

Please start by reading the documentation on how to install apache as a service:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/win_service.html

Then if you still have questions, please bring the to a user support forum such
as the users@httpd mailing list.
creator: slive@apache.org
